thread.title: Tom Brady celebrates unifying 'singular experience' of sports on social media
thread.title_full: Tom Brady celebrates unifying 'singular experience' of sports on social media

title: Tom Brady celebrates unifying 'singular experience' of sports on social media
text:
Tom Brady celebrated the ability of sports to bring people together in an Instagram post Friday.
This is why we love sports, right? No dogma, no blind faith, no rules you have to buy into — just attendance. Show up, and miracles happen. People of every race, religion, ethnicity, political POV and lifestyle share a singular experience for a few hours and become one.
A photo posted by Tom Brady (@tombrady) on Feb 10, 2017 at 7:20am PST
“This is why we love sports, right? No dogma, no blind faith, no rules you have to buy into — just attendance. Show up, and miracles happen. People of every race, religion, ethnicity, political POV and lifestyle share a singular experience for a few hours and become one,” the Patriots quarterback captioned a photo of Julian Edelman’s catch in Super Bowl 51.
